metadata.title: Ocean Sport Tours
metadata.description: Explore unforgettable adventure tours for kids with Ocean Sports Tour. From exciting activities to cultural explorations, we offer safe, educational, and fun experiences.
metadata.keywords: ocean sports tour, adventure tours, kids travel, Morocco tourism, Agadir tours, Marrakech excursions, Essaouira travel, kids activities, sports camps, guided tours, safe travel for children, outdoor adventure, cultural experiences, travel agency Morocco

hero.descr: we specialize in creating unforgettable tour experiences for kids! Our mission is to inspire curiosity, spark creativity, and foster learning through exciting adventures tailored just for young explorers.

about.about_text: ocean sport et tours, company of tourist transport and sport based in Agadir, began operation in 2022. The association operates a very diversified range of services who deemed to be of high quality, they combine availability, proactivity and quality. We are committed to make difference in everything we do, as our main goal is to reflect a great image to tourism in Morocco by listening to the needs and requests of customers and offer them insightful and worry-free experience

choose_1.title: Safe and Secure
choose_1.descr: Your child's safety is our top priority with trained staff and secure trips.

choose_2.title: Fun Activities
choose_2.descr: Engaging and fun experiences that kids will enjoy and remember.

choose_3.title: Educational Value
choose_3.descr: A mix of learning and adventure to expand your child's horizons.

activity_1.title: Aqua Park
activity_1.descr: Enjoy a day of fun-filled water slides, wave pools, and lazy rivers at the aqua park.

activity_2.title: Camel Ride
activity_2.descr: Experience a traditional desert adventure by riding a camel through scenic dunes.

activity_3.title: Hot Air Balloon
activity_3.descr: Soar high above the landscape and take in breathtaking views in a hot air balloon ride.

activity_4.title: Horse Ride
activity_4.descr: Embark on a peaceful journey through trails and open fields on horseback.

activity_5.title: Jetski
activity_5.descr: Feel the thrill of speeding across the water on a high-powered jetski.

activity_6.title: Karting
activity_6.descr: Race against friends and family on a go-kart track for an adrenaline-packed experience.

activity_7.title: Parachute
activity_7.descr: Take a leap of faith and experience the excitement of skydiving with a parachute.

activity_8.title: Quad & Buggy
activity_8.descr: Navigate rugged terrains and sandy trails with a quad bike or buggy ride.

activity_9.title: Sandboarding
activity_9.descr: Slide down towering sand dunes on a sandboard for a unique desert adventure.

activity_10.title: Surfing
activity_10.descr: Catch the waves and enjoy the thrill of surfing in the open sea.

text_ticker.text_1: Inspiring young minds, one adventure at a time.
text_ticker.text_2: Every journey is a chance to spark curiosity and joy.
text_ticker.text_3: Create memories that last a lifetime through exploration and play.
text_ticker.text_4: Organizing adventures, shaping dreams, and bringing smiles.
text_ticker.text_5: Every child deserves the magic of discovery and fun.
text_ticker.text_6: Exploration fuels imagination, and activities bring dreams to life.
text_ticker.text_7: Plan it. Explore it. Cherish it.
text_ticker.text_8: Turning simple trips into extraordinary adventures for kids.
text_ticker.text_9: The organizers who care create the memories kids treasure.
text_ticker.text_10: A well-planned tour is more than a trip, it's a gateway to wonder.

place_1.title: Agadir Oufella
place_1.descr: A historic hilltop fortress offering panoramic views of Agadir and its coastline. It's a perfect spot for history enthusiasts and photographers.

place_2.title: Corniche
place_2.descr: A lively seaside promenade lined with cafes, restaurants, and shops, ideal for leisurely walks and enjoying the ocean breeze.

place_3.title: Croco Park
place_3.descr: A unique crocodile park featuring lush gardens and over 300 Nile crocodiles. A fun and educational experience for families.

place_4.title: Dolphin World Agadir
place_4.descr: An entertainment center where visitors can enjoy dolphin shows and interact with these intelligent marine animals.

place_5.title: Imi Ouaddar
place_5.descr: A picturesque coastal village known for its pristine beaches and laid-back atmosphere, perfect for a relaxing getaway.

place_6.title: Legzira
place_6.descr: Famous for its stunning red rock arches on the beach, this natural wonder is a must-visit for nature lovers and photographers.

place_7.title: Marina
place_7.descr: A modern harbor area featuring luxury yachts, upscale shops, and waterfront dining options.

place_8.title: Medina and Amazigh Heritage Museum
place_8.descr: A cultural hub showcasing traditional Moroccan architecture, art, and artifacts, celebrating Amazigh heritage.

place_9.title: Paradise Valley
place_9.descr: A lush oasis with natural pools and waterfalls, surrounded by palm trees and dramatic cliffs. Ideal for hiking and swimming.

place_10.title: Souss Massa
place_10.descr: A national park known for its diverse wildlife, including flamingos and rare bird species, as well as its scenic landscapes.

place_11.title: Souk El Had
place_11.descr: A bustling traditional market offering a wide variety of goods, from spices and textiles to handicrafts and fresh produce.

place_12.title: Taghazout
place_12.descr: A charming fishing village turned surf haven, known for its world-class waves, relaxed vibe, and stunning sunsets.

place_13.title: Kasbah
place_13.descr: One of the iconic historical sites of Essaouira, located on Morocco's Atlantic coast.

place_14.title: Medina
place_14.descr: Located on Morocco's Atlantic coast, it is a historical and cultural site inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2001. Founded in the 18th century by Sultan Mohammed ben Abdallah, it reflects a unique blend of Islamic and European architecture, showcasing its role as a commercial and cultural crossroads.

place_15.title: Essaouira Ramparts
place_15.descr: Visit the medina's walls to discover breathtaking views—picturesque sunsets, panoramic sea views, and wild cliffs—or head to the old cannons that protect this fortress. Calm and romantic atmosphere; don't forget your camera.

place_16.title: Le Jardin Majorelle
place_16.descr: This enchanting botanical garden, created by Jacques Majorelle and restored by Yves Saint Laurent, offers a haven of peace with exotic plants and buildings painted in Majorelle blue.

place_17.title: Jemaa el-Fna
place_17.descr: The beating heart of Marrakech, this lively square is full of charm. During the day, it hosts vendors, snake charmers, and storytellers. At night, it transforms into a large open-air restaurant.

place_18.title: La Ménara
place_18.descr: This vast garden with its central basin is an ideal place for a relaxing stroll with a magnificent view of the Atlas Mountains.

tour_1.title: Trip from Agadir to Marrakech
tour_1.description: Discover the picturesque landscapes between Agadir and Marrakech with fascinating stops.

tour_2.title: Excursion Marrakech - Essaouira
tour_2.description: Un parcours magique à travers les collines et forêts d'arganiers jusqu'à la côte atlantique.

tour_3.title: Road Trip Essaouira - Agadir
tour_3.description: Partez à la découverte des plages sauvages et des charmants villages côtiers.

tour_4.title: Aventure d'une journée Agadir - Essaouira
tour_4.description: Profitez d'une route panoramique jusqu'à la célèbre ville bleue, Essaouira.

tour_5.title: Circuit Marrakech, Essaouira et Agadir
tour_5.description: Explorez les merveilles de trois villes emblématiques du Maroc.

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.descr: Our company offer for you all the information you're going to need for your unique tour with us, Throughout, ocean sport and tours takes care of everything, from the day you land, until the moment we say goodbye at the airport. About here, you will come across Everything concerning Tariff and schedule of your tours, trips, travels, accommodation… that you can download easy and fast.

opinion.title: What Our Customers Said About Us

opinion_1.name: Alex Smith
opinion_1.opinion: Amazing experience! My kids had a blast on the adventure tour. The guides were friendly and well-prepared. Highly recommended!

opinion_2.name: Mark Johnson
opinion_2.opinion: Great sports activities! My son enjoyed the soccer camp. Everything was well-organized, and the coaches were professional.

opinion_3.name: Juan Lee
opinion_3.opinion: The tour was fun, but the schedule was a bit tight. More free time for kids would be great. Overall, a good experience!

opinion_4.name: David Brown
opinion_4.opinion: Excellent service! My daughter loved the outdoor activities. It was safe, engaging, and educational. Will book again!

opinion_5.name: Emmanual Wilson
opinion_5.opinion: The staff was very caring, and my kids felt comfortable throughout the trip. They especially enjoyed the team-building games!

opinion_6.name: James Carter
opinion_6.opinion: A well-organized tour with a variety of activities. My son loved the basketball training, but the food options could be improved.

opinion_7.name: Oliver Martinez
opinion_7.opinion: Fantastic sports program! My daughter learned so much and made new friends. She's already asking to join again next year.

footer.tanks: Thank you for visiting our website and welcome to

question1.question: How can I help you?
question1.answer: Ocean Sport Tours is a company that offers exciting ocean-related activities and tours.

question2.question: What is Ocean Sport Tours?
question2.answer: Ocean Sport Tours is a company that offers exciting ocean-related activities and tours.

question3.question: What activities do you offer?
question3.answer: We offer a variety of activities including snorkeling, scuba diving, and boat tours.

question4.question: Where are you located?
question4.answer: We operate in multiple locations including tropical islands and coastal cities.

question5.question: How much does it cost?
question5.answer: The pricing varies depending on the activity and location. Please check our website for details.

question6.question: Do I need prior experience?
question6.answer: No prior experience is required for most activities. We provide training for beginners.

question7.question: What safety measures do you have?
question7.answer: We follow strict safety protocols, including certified guides, safety equipment, and emergency procedures.

question8.question: Can I book a private tour?
question8.answer: Yes, private tours are available upon request. Contact us for more details.

question9.question: Do you offer group discounts?
question9.answer: Yes, we offer group discounts for large parties. Reach out to our support team for details.

question10.question: What should I bring for the tour?
question10.answer: We recommend bringing swimwear, sunscreen, a towel, and any necessary personal items.

question11.question: Are children allowed on the tours?
question11.answer: Yes, children are welcome! Some activities may have age restrictions for safety reasons.

question12.question: Do you provide life jackets and safety gear?
question12.answer: Yes, all safety equipment, including life jackets, is provided for each activity.

question13.question: How do I book a tour?
question13.answer: You can book a tour online through our website or contact our customer service team.

question14.question: What payment methods do you accept?
question14.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
